release.name: Maybe not today. Maybe not tomorrow, but soon...

intro.p: The GStreamer team is proud to announce a new release in the 0.10.x stable series of the GStreamer Python Bindings.
The 0.10.x series is a stable series targeted at end users. It is not API or ABI compatible with the stable 0.8.x series. It is, however, parallel installable with the 0.8.x series.

features.feature: Backwards compatibility with older GStreamer installations
